script: Armand Junior Dongmo Notue is a data scientist with extensive expertise in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), and AI. His professional background includes roles as a Data Scientist at Outlier and an Intern in Data Analytics at African Think Tank, where he contributed to improving program effectiveness through advanced statistical analysis and automated dashboards. He holds master's degrees from Grand Canyon University and the University of Douala, with additional coursework focused on data science and machine learning. Key skills highlighted include proficiency in various machine learning algorithms (supervised and unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning), deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch), NLP techniques (BERT, GPT, LSTM), and MLOps practices. Notue has a robust track record of developing real-time AI solutions, deploying ML pipelines, and optimizing predictive models to drive business impact. His projects include transformer-based NLP models for sentiment analysis, an AI-driven job market insights platform, a real-time fraud detection system, time series forecasting for retail sales optimization, and custom neural network implementations. Through his educational background and professional experience, Notue demonstrates strong hands-on skills in cloud computing (AWS, GCP) and tools such as Python, SQL, Pandas, NumPy, Tableau, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Spark. His certifications from prestigious institutions like Harvard University and Coursera further validate his capabilities in data science and machine learning. Notable achievements include a 15% accuracy improvement in AI models through real-time evaluation at Outlier and the development of an NLP model for sentiment analysis that achieved 88.3% accuracy, significantly enhancing business insights. His work also includes increasing fraud detection accuracy by 35%, improving customer segmentation methods to enhance personalized marketing efforts, and building a robust time series forecasting system to optimize retail inventory.
